entry.tran: (与数词或形容词连用)表示“有…个边的”，“有…面的”
entry.def: -sided combines with numbers or adjectives to describe how many sides something has, or what kind of sides something has.

example.ex: We drove up a steep-sided valley.
example.tran: 我们沿着陡峭的峡谷向上开。
